venue.phone: Please Send Me A Message on Meet
venue.name: Davis Square

item.description:
From streetcar suburb to urban decline and decay to one of the "hippest places to live" in the United States, Somerville's Davis Square has seen it all. Come learn about this unique residential neighborhood, commercial district, and haven for arts and entertainment.

Due to popular demand, this tour is has been RESCHEDULED from its original August date, during Hurricane Irene. Don't miss it!

Rain or shine; no reservations necessary.

Admission: $15. Join as a Boston By Foot member for discounts!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet your guides in the Davis Square plaza, across from the Somerville Theatre and the Davis Square T stop
item.name: Davis Square: A Walking Tour
